title: CEO Secrets: 'Company culture shouldn't be too nice'
description: If your firm's culture is too nice, no one tells when you make mistakes, says CEO Tamara Littleton.

title: 'A magical moment from a magical player' - Ronaldo rescues Man Utd again
description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer calls Cristiano Ronaldo Manchester United's Michael Jordan, but can they keep relying on his late goals?

title: COP26: South Africa hails deal to end reliance on coal
description: More than 80% of South Africa's power is generated with coal - its sulphur smell polluting large areas.

title: My day at COP26: 'My island home is threatened - we have no hill to run to'
description: Kathy Jetn̄il-Kijiner, a poet and activist, is at COP26 as a climate envoy for the Marshall Islands in the Pacific Ocean.

title: Leonardo DiCaprio brings star power to Glasgow for COP26
description: The actor and UN climate change representative is mobbed by fans and journalists on arrival.

title: Liverpool Greggs superfan gets tattoo of vegan sausage roll
description: Beth Kweeday went viral on social media after paying homage to her favourite bakery snack.

title: 'I was abused by my ex and then jailed for lying'
description: Campaigners are calling for new laws to protect domestic abuse victims who commit crimes.

title: COP26: World leaders promise to end deforestation by 2030
description: More than 100 nations - including Brazil, Russia and Indonesia - sign COP26's first major deal.

title: Antonio Conte: Tottenham appoint former Chelsea boss as new manager
description: Tottenham name former Chelsea boss Antonio Conte as their new manager on a contract until summer 2023.

title: COP26: We must act on accessibility, says Israeli minister
description: Israel's Karine Elharrar was unable to access the climate summit in her wheelchair on Monday.

title: Brazil: Amazon parrot plays peekaboo with CCTV traffic camera
description: A turquoise-fronted amazon parrot was captured investigating a CCTV camera in Curitiba, Brazil.

title: Insulate Britain protests target Manchester Airport and the M25
description: Protesters are causing delays near Manchester Airport, as well as targeting the M25 and Birmingham.

title: Nigeria Ikoyi building collapse: Race to find survivors
description: Rescuers have worked through the night in Lagos, with many people feared trapped under rubble.

title: Bibaa Henry and Nicole Smallman: Met Police officers admit sharing photos
description: The two constables were supposed to be protecting the Bibaa Henry and Nicole Smallman murder scene.

title: Morrisons sorry for 'non-EU salt and pepper' chicken label
description: The supermarket says it was an "error" to put the description on one of its chickens.

title: Newcastle want Emery in charge before Saturday
description: Villarreal head coach Unai Emery is the leading candidate to take over as Newcastle manager.

title: MPs told to wear masks in Parliament amid rising Covid cases
description: Tours of Parliament have also been cancelled as health body warns of greater risk of transmission.

title: COP26: US to stop methane leaks from oil and gas wells
description: The Biden administration plans to restore tough rules curbing one of the most potent greenhouse gases.

title: MPs call for five-year delay in all-lane smart motorways
description: They say more safety data is needed before the hard shoulder is made into a permanent traffic lane.

title: Spain energy crisis: Soaring bills hamper recovery from Covid
description: Spain is less connected to the international grid than other EU countries and prices are surging.

title: Appeal after trick-or-treaters bring Newcastle grandma gifts
description: A group of children gave chocolates to her after she apologised for not having treats to give them.

title: COP26: Scotland's young climate change activists in pictures
description: Photographer Andrew Cawley set out to capture "the Scottish Greta Thunbergs" on camera ahead of COP26.

title: Squid Game crypto token collapses in apparent scam
description: Inspired by the hugely popular Netflix series Squid Game, the tokens had rocketed in value.

title: The Papers: Queen's 'emotive plea' and deal to save forests
description: The front pages focus on the latest developments from the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow.

title: Plastics in wet wipes should be banned, says Labour MP
description: Labour MP Fleur Anderson is proposing a new law to ban wet wipes that contain plastic.

title: COP26: What climate summit means for one woman in Bangladesh
description: What do decisions made at a summit in Glasgow mean for a woman in a village on the front line of climate change?

title: Climate change: Five dealmakers who will influence the outcome at COP26
description: Who are the people who will determine the success or failure of the climate summit?

title: TikTok like a bodyguard, says busker Mia Kirkland
description: Mia Kirkland says support from followers helped her to overcome being assaulted while she performed.

title: Climate change: Should we save or exploit the vanishing Amazon?
description: The BBC's Orla Guerin meets four Amazon-dwellers with differing views on the rainforest's protection.

title: World Series: The sports data pioneer who spotted baseball's big fix of 1919
description: The World Series was rigged. Hugh Fullerton's revolutionary analysis backed it up. But in 1919 his calls were ignored by a game now transformed by data.

title: Climate summit: Behind the scenes at COP26
description: The BBC’s Science Editor David Shukman takes a look inside the UN’s climate conference in Glasgow.

title: Why Africa urgently needs its own genetic library
description: Genetically profiling three million Africans could be key for better healthcare, argue scientists.

title: Why UK interest rates could rise this week
description: Borrowing money in the UK has been cheap for years. But that is unlikely to last for much longer.
